content: we guys in the middle of europe don´t have much green and color to look at for 4 to 6 months every year so i made up a flower suitable for christmas season i created it as a ribbon for presents but for sure there are many ways to use the flowers go wild and let them sprout anywhere use any yarn you like and chose a suitabel hook you will need only a small amount of yarn so maybe you could reduce your stored scraps the pattern is quite easy but you will have to fiddle with flo blo and restricted space under the leaves - anyhow small flaws will not show in the end let´s make flowers for christmas
